title: When you buy a legendary skin can you gift the mystery gift to your friend
body:
When you buy a legendary skin can you gift the mystery gift you get from buying the skin?
So if i was going to buy a legendary skin and i get the mystery gift with it can i gift it to my friend?
Plz help asap

replies.body:
Unfortunately not. The additional Mystery Gift (skin) is automatically applied to your account (or whoever receives the Legendary Skin). As far as I'm aware, there aren't any exceptions. For more information about the Legendary Snowball event, check out the event page below!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/look-out-its-snowdown#legendary
